text: Beguman meren musilman u jinen musilman, u meren bawermend u jinen bawermend u meren ji dil perestvan u jinen ji dil perestvan u meren rastgo u jinen rastgo u meren bihnfireh u jinen bihnfireh u meren dilbitirs u jinen dilbitirs u meren qencikar u jinen qencikar u meren rojigirt u jinen rojigirt u meren dawparez u jinen dawparez u meren Xuda pirr di bir tinin u jinen di bir tinin, Xuda ji wan re bexÃ¾ineki u peruki mezin amade kiriye
